member.summary:
Detect the changes done to the folder
Updates the metadata
member.param: This parameter is the folder path to be checked
This parameter is the filter which will be used during synchronization
This parameter holds the synchronization options

member.summary: Start the synchronization in one direction
member.param: This parameter holds the source folder path
This parameter holds the destination folder path
This parameter is the filter which will be used during synchronization
This parameter holds the synchronization options
This parameter is a boolean which indicates if this method should be run in preview mode
member.returns: Returns a boolean to indicate if the the synchronization was successful

member.summary: Checks if there is sufficient disk space for synchronization to be done
member.returns: Returns a boolean of the result

member.summary: This method is called when there are conflicting items during synchronization

member.summary: This method is called when there are constraint items during synchronization

member.name: M:nsync.SyncEngine.OnAppliedChange(System.Object,Microsoft.Synchronization.Files.AppliedChangeEventArgs)
member.summary:
This method is called when changes are done to a file
Counts the number of changes already done by the sync framework
Reports the progress percentage to the backgroundWorker

member.name: M:nsync.SyncEngine.OnApplyingChange(System.Object,Microsoft.Synchronization.Files.ApplyingChangeEventArgs)
member.summary:
This method is called when changes are going to be done to a file
Counts the number of changes to be made later during synchronization
Counts the amount of disk space needed later during synchronization
